BinaryImage - class jigl.image.BinaryImage.
BinaryImage is a 2-d array of byte.
BinaryImage() - Constructor for class jigl.image.BinaryImage
Creates an empty two dimensional BinaryImage with a height and width of zero
BinaryImage(int, int) - Constructor for class jigl.image.BinaryImage
Creates a two dimensional BinaryImage with a height and width of x and y repectively
BinaryImage(int, int, byte[]) - Constructor for class jigl.image.BinaryImage
Creates a two dimensional BinaryImage with a height and width of x and y repectively
BinaryImage(GrayImage) - Constructor for class jigl.image.BinaryImage
Creates a two dimensional BinaryImage from a GrayImage.
BinaryImage(RealGrayImage) - Constructor for class jigl.image.BinaryImage
Creates a two dimensional BinaryImage from a RealGrayImage.
BinaryImage(BinaryImage) - Constructor for class jigl.image.BinaryImage
Creates a two dimensional BinaryImage (shallow copy) from BinaryImage img
